entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Controller for HomeKit
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫4.499,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫1.499,99 [‚Ç∫1.499,99 ~ ‚Ç∫4.499,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • PRO yearly subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Lifetime licenseÔºö‚Ç∫1.499,99
  • Monthly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫109,99
  • Yearly SubscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫459,99

Application Description

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: LUCH: Photo Effects & Presets
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫29,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Recruit legendary heroes and conquer endless stages! From auto battles to mining and upgrading! A true idle fantasy RPG that keeps growing even when you're away! * Build strategic teams with unique and powerful heroes! * Mine resources through the mining system! Get everything you need to craft gear! * Challenge powerful bosses and claim legendary rewards! * Progress automatically ‚Äî perfect for busy players! * Tons of content: dungeons, relics, evolution, legendary equipment, and more! Download now and begin writing your own legend! Start playing now and collect your heroes!

entry.title: Vostok ‚Äî Story Maker
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫39,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Welcome to Vostok ‚Äì your ultimate companion for crafting captivating stories and stunning collages, designed to elevate your social media presence! With Vostok, transforming your ideas into professional-grade posts and stories is now a breeze. Whether you're a blogger, photographer, or simply love sharing your life's moments on social media, Vostok provides all the tools you need to create content that will make an impact. Our sleek and user-friendly app seamlessly combines your passion for photography and storytelling, offering a dynamic platform to showcase your awe-inspiring moments. Embracing a minimalist style, Vostok becomes your canvas for unlimited creativity. A vast collection of templates, stickers, and effects empowers you to design unique stories that reflect your individuality. But Vostok goes beyond creative freedom; it's all about simplicity. Our intuitive interface makes editing and sharing your content effortless, freeing up more time for you to focus on crafting compelling narratives that your followers will adore. No more waiting! Embark on your Vostok journey today and craft captivating posts and stories that leave a lasting impression! Here's a glimpse of some of our features: ¬∑ 200+ design templates for social media ¬∑ Exclusive fonts with Cyrillic support ¬∑ 450+ unique stickers ¬∑ Atmospheric dust and grain effects for photos ¬∑ Variety of backgrounds: paper textures, marble, gradients, colors ¬∑ Ad-free with no subscription requirements ¬∑ Dark mode compatibility Recognized as one of the Best Apps of 2019 by Apple. With over 200+ templates, Vostok is your go-to toolkit for creating standout social media content. We eagerly look forward to your ideas and feedback. Connect with us at hello@vostokapp.ru or drop us a direct message on Instagram at @vostokapp.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Whisper Notes - Speech To Text
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Whisper Notes: Offline speech-to-text powered by Whisper AI, perfect for capturing daily voice memos and meeting notes. The app runs completely offline to ensure your voice recordings and privacy never leave your device. No subscriptions, no in-app purchases, no ads‚Äîjust a simple one-time payment for lifetime access. ‚ñ† Features - Local voice recording & transcription - Import and transcribe audio/video files, all offline - Batch export or delete text and audio files - Supports export of timestamped transcript ‚ñ† Why we made this Sometimes I have a bizarre dream and want to record it when I wake up, but typing with sleepy eyes is tough. I needed a tool that could quickly capture and transcribe speech. When friends send messages that need long replies while I'm out walking or eating, I want to respond quickly without sending voice messages. ‚ñ† FAQ 1. Does it support real-time transcription during recording? Not currently‚Äîit records first, then transcribes when you're finished recording. 2. Is there a maximum transcription length? No limit in theory‚Äîyou can record several hours of audio. However, since transcription happens on your device, longer recordings will take more time to process. I've tested it with about 1 hour of audio and the transcription was accurate. 3. What's the transcription speed? It depends on your device. On my iPhone 15, the transcription speed is about 1:5, meaning 5 minutes of audio takes about 1 minute to transcribe. 4. Why is this a paid app without a free trial? We designed Whisper Notes to be completely offline to protect your privacy. Once you download and open the app, it never connects to the internet again. Offering a free trial would require in-app purchases, which need an internet connection‚Äîexactly what we're trying to avoid to keep your data secure. If you're not satisfied, just tap the settings button in the top right corner to find the "Request Refund" option. 5. Why doesn't it support AI summaries? Privacy is our top priority. We never upload your voice recordings or transcriptions to any AI services or cloud servers. You can always copy your transcriptions and use your preferred AI tool separately if you want summaries. 6. Why does transcription stop when I switch to another app? Because Whisper Notes uses on-device processing, it needs access to your phone's GPU to transcribe audio. Apple doesn't allow third-party apps to use the GPU when running in the background, so iOS automatically stops the transcription process when you leave the app. If this happens, simply return to the app and tap "Re-transcribe" to pick up where you left off. 7. What languages are supported? English, ‰∏≠Êñá, Deutsch, Espa√±ol, –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥, Fran√ßais, Êó•Êú¨Ë™û, Portugu√™s, T√ºrk√ße, Polski, Catal√†, Nederlands, Arabic, Svenska, Italiano, Bahasa Indonesia, Hindi, Suomi, Ti·∫øng Vi·ªát, Hebrew, –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞, Greek, Bahasa Melayu, ƒåe≈°tina, Rom√¢nƒÉ, Dansk, Magyar, Tamil, Norsk, Thai, Urdu, Hrvatski, Bulgarian, Lietuvi≈≥, Latina, MƒÅori, Malayalam, Cymraeg, Slovenƒçina, Telugu, Persian, Latvie≈°u, Bengali, –°—Ä–ø—Å–∫–∏, Az…ôrbaycan, Sloven≈°ƒçina, Kannada, Eesti, Macedonian, Brezhoneg, Euskara, √çslenska, Armenian, Nepali, Mongolian, Bosanski, Kazakh, Shqip, Kiswahili, Galego, Marathi, Punjabi, Sinhala, Khmer, chiShona, Yor√πb√°, Soomaali, Afrikaans, Occitan, Georgian, Belarusian, Tajik, Sindhi, Gujarati, Amharic, Yiddish, Lao, Uzbek, F√∏royskt, Krey√≤l Ayisyen, Pashto, Turkmen, Nynorsk, Malti, Sanskrit, Luxembourgish, Myanmar, Tibetan, Tagalog, Malagasy, Assamese, Tatar, Hawaiian, Lingala, Hausa, Bashkir, Javanese, Sundanese ‚ñ† Contact support@whispernotes.app https://whispernotes.app

Application Description

Turn Your Apple Watch into a Sound Effect Generator! With this fun and exciting Apple Watch app, you can choose your favorite sound effects and activate them with just a flick of your wrist! Immerse yourself in the world of superheroes‚Äîtransform like Iron Man or Spider-Man, or explore a variety of other thrilling sounds. From realistic gun effects to animal sounds, police sirens, ambulance alarms, and much more, there‚Äôs always something new to discover! Download now and unleash the power of sound‚Äîbring your childhood dreams to life!

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you! Highlight Features: ‚Ä¢ Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos‚Äô audio in the background. ‚Ä¢ Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos. ‚Ä¢ Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free. ‚Ä¢ Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat. It also includes: ‚Ä¢ Toggleable subtitles ‚Ä¢ Playback speed control ‚Ä¢ Quality selection and fullscreen mode ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search) ‚Ä¢ Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year FyTube is perfect for those who don‚Äôt want to miss a single video about their favorite topics. Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest ‚Äî interruption-free! SPECIAL FEATURES FLOATING PLAYBACK Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps . Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button ‚Äî it‚Äôs the second icon at the top of the player. Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open! LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK Listen without interruptions! Keep enjoying your video‚Äôs audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing. How to activate it? Just lock your device screen. You‚Äôll instantly see the background player. Tap Play ‚Äî and that‚Äôs it! The audio will keep going without pauses. SLEEP TIMER Fall asleep peacefully ‚Äî your app will stop by itself! Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything. How to activate it? Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that‚Äôs it. Relax and let the app handle the rest! LOOP MODE Play your favorite video over and over again! Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want. How to know if it‚Äôs on? The icon will turn red when active. (VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it‚Äôs on or off.) Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat! Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Fullscreen high-quality video playback ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design ‚Ä¢ Skip forward or rewind anytime ‚Äî never miss the best parts ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation ‚Ä¢ Adjust playback speed to your preference ‚Ä¢ Change video quality ‚Ä¢ Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all ‚Ä¢ Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions) ‚Ä¢ No account required ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission ‚Äî watch safely ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages ‚Ä¢ NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience ‚Äî ad-free and subscription-free. Minimum Requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or later ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Keywords related to our app: youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc. Have questions about how to use FyTube? Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us ‚Äî we‚Äôll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ

entry.content:

Application Description

Scan docs into clear & sharp image/PDF, to email, fax, print or save to cloud. * Over 200,000 new registrations per day * App Store Best of 2014 * CamScanner, 50 Best iPhone Apps, 2013 Edition ‚Äì TIME ----Paid App Features---- * All features that the free version has * Recognize and extract texts from a single page * Larger cloud space of 400M (200M for free version) * Export PDFs without watermark "Scanned by CamScanner" * Ad-free Features: *Mobile Scanner Use your phone camera to scan receipts, notes, invoices, whiteboard discussions, business cards, certificates, etc. *Optimize Scan Quality Smart cropping and auto enhancing make the texts and graphics look clear and sharp. *Extract Texts from Image OCR (optical character recognition) feature extracts texts from single page for further editing or sharing. (Paid app only) *Share PDF/JPEG Files Easily share documents in PDF or JPEG format with others via social media, email attachment or sending the doc link. *AirPrint & Fax Documents Instantly print out docs in CamScanner with nearby printer via AirPrint; directly fax docs to over 30 countries from the app. *Collaboration Invite friends or colleagues to view and comment on your scans in a group. (Registrants only) *Advanced Editing Making annotations or adding customized watermark on docs are made available for you. *Secure Important Docs Set passcode for viewing important docs; meanwhile, when sending doc link, you can set password to protect it. *Sync across Platforms Sign up to sync documents on the go. Just sign in to any smartphone, tablet or computer (visit CamScanner website) you own and you can view, edit and share any document. Premium Subscription Service: 1. Edit OCR results and notes of the entire doc, exporting as .txt file 2. Create Doc Collage for multiple pages 3. Add 10G cloud space 4. Add 40 extra collaborators 5. Send doc link with password protection and expiration date 6. Auto upload docs to Box, Google Drive, Dropbox, Evernote and OneDrive 7. Batch download PDF files in web app 8. Every benefit registrants enjoys 9. Everything paid app offers Payment models for Premium subscription: -4.99 USD/month -49.99 USD/year ‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. ‚Ä¢ Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. ‚Ä¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. ‚Ä¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. For Terms of Use, please visit https://www.camscanner.com/app/service?language=en-us For Privacy Policy, please visit https://www.camscanner.com/app/privacy?language=en-us CamScanner users scan and manage * Bill, Invoice, Contract, Tax Roll, Business Card‚Ä¶ * Whiteboard, Memo, Script, Letter‚Ä¶ * Blackboard, Note, PPT, Book, Article‚Ä¶ * Credential, Certificate, Identity Documents‚Ä¶ 3rd Party Cloud Storage Services Supported: -Box, Google Drive, Evernote, Dropbox, OneDrive We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback: isupport@intsig.com Follow us on Twitter: @CamScanner Like us on Facebook: CamScanner Follow us on Google+: CamScanner Check out other INTSIG‚Äôs products: CamCard - Business Card Reader CamDictionary - Snap Translator

entry.title: Codenames
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket. A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking --------------------------------------------------- Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone. Inspired by the Iconic Board Game ---------------------------------- Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chv√°til, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon. More Content, More Fun ------------------------- While staying true to the original‚Äôs clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames. Play Anytime, Anywhere ------------------------ With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges. Build Your Secret Agent Career ------------------------------- Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster! Connect and Compete with Friends ----------------------------------- Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words. Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

entry.title: Neighbours back From Hell
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫29,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫11,99 [‚Ç∫11,99 ~ ‚Ç∫29,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫11,99

Application Description

"Did you know that ‚ÄúSchadenfreude‚Äù is a German word defined as the concept of finding joy in someone else‚Äôs misfortune? It is also the main idea on which Neighbours back From Hell is built. A whole TV show based on playing increasingly outrageous pranks on your grumpy neighbor to keep the audience entertained, and viewership numbers high. It‚Äôs good to be bad in this early 2000s trash TV-inspired slapstick extravaganza! As Woody, the vengeful star protagonist of Neighbours back From Hell, you will prank your way through Seasons 1 and 2 of the fictitious, but aptly named TV show. Take the mischief from your nasty neighbor‚Äôs flat all the way to China, India, and Mexico where you will make sure his holiday is a living hell. While you‚Äôre at it, why limit targeting your antics at your neighbor, when you can involve his mother and fellow travelers? Whatever you decide to do, your trusty camera crew will be right there and keep a keen eye on all the action. You can let your crooked creativity flow freely and watch the neighbor rage in desperation. Just be mindful not to get caught by him or his companions, or they will whoop you good and your TV show will be taken off the air. If you perform well on the other hand, by creating more and more disarray and chaos in the neighbor‚Äôs life, ratings will increase, and you could win prestigious awards. " Neighbours From Hell 1 & 2 Remastered in one package: 28 episodes set in the neighbor‚Äôs home, on a cruise liner, and in several different holiday locations around the world - All graphics newly rendered in Full HD - Framerate of all animations doubled for a smoother experience - Use stealth, skill, and style to perform the perfect ambush - Easy to use interface and controls - Superb cartoon-style graphics - Big band soundtrack - Game Center support - Full controller support ¬© HandyGames

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Rush Rally 3
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Classic DLC PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Retro Expansion PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Gravel Track PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Live Event ServiceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Rush Rally 3 is the most realistic rally simulation on your mobile. CONSOLE QUALITY RALLYING 60fps racing at night or day in the rain or snow! Over 72 new and unique stages each with different surface types including snow, gravel, tarmac and dirt! Race with one of the best car dynamics models to date, including real time vehicle deformation and damage, built from over 15 years experience. WORLD RALLY RACING! Take on the new Career mode, race A-B stages over a Single Rally or grind metal to metal with other cars in Rally Cross. LIVE EVENTS Compete in weekly events against other players all over the world on a unique selection of tracks! BUILD YOUR GARAGE Upgrade, tune and customise a garage full of cars. Use the new livery editor to completely change the look of your vehicles. Buy new wheels and upgrades to make each car truly unique. COMPETE WITH FRIENDS, MULTIPLAYER AND OFFLINE! Real-Time multiplayer, Social Leaderboards and Ghost Racing allow you to race any player at anytime. See how you compare with the worlds best. OPTIMISED CONTROLS! A fully customisable control system designed specifically for touch and tilt devices means racing becomes more fun and consistent. Place the controls where you want them! Also includes full support for all MFi controllers _______________________________________________________ Hook up with new players and find out more about Rush Rally 3: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rushrallygame/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/RushRally Facebook: https://twitter.com/RushRally _______________________________________________________ PRAISE FOR RUSH RALLY SERIES Touch Arcade - "Rush Rally 3 - Game of the week" 9 / 10 - Pocket Gamer - "Rush Rally 3 - Probably the best rally experience for mobile right now" 5 / 5 - Touch Arcade - "Rush Rally 2 - Easily one of the best racing games on mobile" 9 / 10 - Pocket Gamer - "Rush Rally 2 - You should grab this as soon as you get the chance" 9 / 10 - Multiplayer.it - "Rush Rally 2 - Undoubtedly the best rally game on mobile" - International mobile game awards (IMGA) game of the year award Nominee 2017 - - Short listed by games industry experts in the Develop Indie showcase awards 2014 -

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Wreckfest
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫69,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫11,99 [‚Ç∫11,99 ~ ‚Ç∫69,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫11,99

In-App Purchases

  • Content Bundle 1Ôºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Getaway Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Content Bundle 2Ôºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • Modified Monsters Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Steel & Wheels PackÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Off-Road Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Racing Heroes Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • American All-Stars Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Rusty Rats Car PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Goofy Roofs PackÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Burn rubber and shred metal in the ultimate driving playground! Wreckfest is jam-packed with upgrade and customization options. Whether you are preparing for your next demolition derby with reinforced bumpers, roll cages, side protectors and much more, or setting your car up for a banger race with engine performance parts like air filters, camshafts, fuel systems, etc., Wreckfest is shaping up to be the best combative motorsport game out there. ‚Ä¢ Unique Racing Experience ‚Äì Exhilarating no-rules racing action with defining, once-in-a-lifetime moments that can be achieved only with a true-to-life physics simulation. Witness insane neck-to-neck fighting on high-speed circuits, face total destruction madness on crazy courses with intersections and oncoming traffic, or go for demolition dominance in derby arenas. ‚Ä¢ Awesome Cars ‚Äì Our cars are old, banged up, patched together... They ooze style and character! From old American heavy-hitters to agile Europeans and fun Asians, you won‚Äôt find anything like this in other games. ‚Ä¢ Meaningful Customization ‚Äì Change not only the look of your cars but also upgrade their body armor ‚Äì Reinforce them with heavy iron that protects you from damage, but also adds weight, which impacts the cars handling. Modify your car to make a robust tank or a fragile but lightning-fast rocket, or anything in between! ‚Ä¢ Multiplayer ‚Äì Wreck your friends in local multiplayer and take racing to the limit while chasing for demolition dominance! ‚Ä¢ Challenge modes ‚Äì Have hilarious fun with crop harvesters, lawn mowers, school buses, three-wheelers and much more! ‚Ä¢ Career Mode ‚Äì Battle for championships, earn experience, unlock new upgrades and cars, and become the all-time Wreckfest champion! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: ATracker PRO Time Tracker
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Web portal subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫92,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫10,49 [‚Ç∫10,49 ~ ‚Ç∫92,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • Web portal subscriptionÔºö‚Ç∫10,49

Application Description

Life is precious and so is your time. And keeping that in mind, ATracker is here to help you achieve more of your goals, build a sustainable habit, and boost your productivity to a new height. ATracker is a simple yet very powerful time tracking app and productivity tool that allows you to use it with minimal setup. Having a track of your precious time has never been easier with our one-tap to start/stop time tracking. As the leading time tracking app, ATracker also offers bar or pie charts showcasing where your time went. Lots of features for self-development The fully customizable user interface allows you to turn this habit tracker into your own. The tracking app also comes with the option of categorizing tasks with tags; data export; sync data between multiple devices for the shortest path towards self-improvement and the perfect boost of productivity. It's a fresh way to organize your day and make the most out of it ‚Ä¶ with just a few taps. SCOPE ATracker is a clean and minimalistic approach to, ‚Ä¢ Track time of different tasks and projects at work ‚Ä¢ Track time of School studies and projects ‚Ä¢ Track time of Exercises ‚Ä¢ Track time of Socializing ‚Ä¢ Track time of Homemaking tasks ‚Ä¢ Track time of Baby or child daily activities ‚Ä¢ Hobby projects ‚Ä¢ Or any activity people want to track and control We believe that time tracking should be effortless. Here are some of the key features ATracker offers ‚Ä¢ Start and stop tracking a task with just one tap. ‚Ä¢ Overview of today's time spending on the Today tab. ‚Ä¢ Interactive goal system for self-improvement. ‚Ä¢ Complete activity log. Show activities on any given date. Add missed or modify existing activity. ‚Ä¢ Customization of activities with hundreds of unique icons to choose from. You can also color code the activities for a personalized time tracking experience. ‚Ä¢ Ability to keep notes for each task entry. ‚Ä¢ Statistics showed in bar charts and pie charts. ‚Ä¢ Group tasks by tags and allow users to filter tasks by tag on the Today tab, as well as aggregate the data by tag in reporting. ‚Ä¢ The activity timer does not stop even when the application is not running, or your mobile is in sleep mode. ‚Ä¢ Set alarm for activities. The alarm will sound even when the app is not running. ‚Ä¢ Widget to see your data on-screen at all times. ‚Ä¢ Gesture support ‚Ä¢ Full customization of UI with more skins and allow the user to use their own image as background. PRO FEATURES With an only one-time investment, you will get to enjoy, - No Ads. - Unlimited tasks - Data export with PDF and CSV file. - Able to keep notes for each task entry. - Full customization of UI with more skins and allow user to use own image as background. WEB SUBSCRIPTION With web subscription, ATracker supports sync across multiple devices. It also provides web access to ATracker services besides the app. This add-on is optional. ‚Ä¢ ATracker subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. ‚Ä¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase ‚Ä¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period ‚Ä¢ Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal ‚Ä¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase ‚Ä¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable SUPPORT Visit https://support.wonderapps.se or contact us at support@wonderapps.se Terms of Service: https://atracker.pro/atracker_TOS.html Privacy Policy: https://atracker.pro/atracker_policy.html Life is precious and so is your Time. So, stop wasting your time and organize your life the right way NOW.
